about_the_game:
You're a plastic soldier fighting to defend the backyard...
Witness full scale plastic warfare and fight in the open world backyard. You and your team of up to 10 players must defend the backyard at all costs. Capture toy cities, and maintain control over supply lines to to fuel the war effort. Purchase weapons, abilities, and vehicles to shape the battlefield to your strengths. The opposing team as well as other toys that have come to life will pose a serious threat. Fortifying your positions, sneak attacks, and high intensity assaults are all on the table.

Key Features
  • One Battlefield, Limitless Possibilities - The battlefield is expansive and open world. Fully destructible toy cities, combined with the devastating fire power from items and vehicles will shape the battlefield differently as the game progresses. No two games in Plastic will be the same.
  • Experience large scale plastic warfare - Battle to defend the backyard over the land, air, and sea on a scale never seen before. You may be a toy soldier, but the war couldn't be more real.
  • Play to your strengths - Get the right combination of weapons, vehicles, and gear to suit your play style. Become an elite sniper, and disrupt enemy troop movement. Specialize in artillery and rain hell from above. Pilot a cargo helicopter to sling load a tank into enemy territory and wreak havoc.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560,Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, Intel Core i7 4790
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT, Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: You're a plastic soldier fighting to defend the backyard. An online third person shooter where the focus is on item sets and team coordinated assaults in an open world objective driven game mode.
